table_description: Tags for commits in the given repository.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the tag.

columns.name: tagger_name
columns.description: Name of user whom created the tag.

columns.name: tagger_login
columns.description: Login of user whom created the tag.

columns.name: commit
columns.description: Commit the tag is associated with.
